params:

  target: target

## This is a first version of a basic report:

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(rmarkdown, quietly = TRUE)
data = params$data
target = params$target
```


## Running Basic Data Summary 
```{r basicDataSummary, echo = FALSE}
basic.data.sum = basicDataSummary(data = data, target = target)
basic.data.sum
```
The dataset `r deparse(substitute(data))` contains of `r basic.data.sum$obs` and `r basic.data.sum$NAs` missing values.
